[22] pamatto appamattaṃ maṃ, pitā puttaṃ acodayi..
[22] tato kiccāni kāreyya, taṃ vataṃ āhu khattiya..
[21] ``yaṃ ^a^V2.0002^ea^ tvaṃ tāta tapokammaṃ {tape kammaṃ (sī0 syā0 pī0)}, pubbe katamasaṃsayaṃ.
[22] ratto duṭṭho ca yaṃ kayirā, na taṃ kayirā tato puna {punaṃ (pī0)}..
[22] sabbe bhogā vinassanti, rañño taṃ vuccate aghaṃ..
[21] ``sirī tāta alakkhī ca {sirī ca tāta lakkhī ca (syā0 pī0)}, pucchitā etadabravuṃ.
[21] ``so tvaṃ sabbesu suhadayo {so tvaṃ sabbesaṃ suhadayo (syā0 pī0), so tvaṃ sabbe suhadayo (ka0)}, sabbesaṃ rakkhito bhava.
[22] alakkhiṃ nuda mahārāja, lakkhyā bhava nivesanaṃ..
[22] sa kalyāṇe dhitiṃ katvā, uṭṭhāne kurute mano..
[22] vāyamassu ca kiccesu, nālaso vindate sukhaṃ..
[22] alaṃ mitte sukhāpetuṃ, amittānaṃ dukhāya {dukkhāya (pī0)} ca''..
[21] ``sakkhisi tvaṃ {sakkhī tuvaṃ (sī0 syā0 pī0)} kuṇḍalini, maññasi khattabandhuni {khattiyabandhunī (pī0)}.
[22] rajjaṃ kāretukāmena, kiṃ su kiccaṃ kataṃ varaṃ''..
[22] aladdhassa ca yo lābho, laddhassa cānurakkhaṇā..
[21] ``yo ca taṃ tāta rakkheyya, dhanaṃ yañceva te siyā.
[22] sūtova rathaṃ saṅgaṇhe, so te kiccāni kāraye..
[21] ``sayaṃ ^a^V2.0003^ea^ ^a^M2.0003^ea^ āyaṃ ^a^T1.0532^ea^ vayaṃ {āyavayaṃ (pī0)} jaññā, sayaṃ jaññā katākataṃ.
[22] mā te adhammikā yuttā, dhanaṃ raṭṭhañca nāsayuṃ..
[21] ``mā ca vegena kiccāni, karosi {kāresi (sī0 syā0 pī0)} kārayesi vā.
[22] vegasā hi kataṃ kammaṃ, mando pacchānutappati..
[22] kodhasā hi bahū phītā, kulā akulataṃ gatā..
[22] itthīnaṃ purisānañca, mā te āsi dukhudrayo..
[22] sabbe bhogā vinassanti, rañño taṃ vuccate aghaṃ..
[21] ``apucchimha kosiyagottaṃ {apucchimhā kosiyagottaṃ (syā0), apucchamhāpi kosikaṃ (pī0)}, kuṇḍaliniṃ tatheva ca.
[22] tvaṃ dāni vadehi jambuka {jambuka tvaṃ dāni vadehi (syā0 pī0)}, balānaṃ balamuttamaṃ''..
[22] tattha bāhubalaṃ nāma, carimaṃ vuccate balaṃ..
[21] ``taṃ balānaṃ balaṃ seṭṭhaṃ, aggaṃ paññābaṃ balaṃ {varaṃ (sī0)}.
[22] akāmassa pasayhaṃ vā, añño taṃ paṭipajjati..
[22] duppañño hi kāsipati, sabbenapi na jīvati..
[21] ``paññāva ^a^V2.0004^ea^ sutaṃ vinicchinī {paññā sutavinicchinī (syā0 pī0)}, paññā kitti silokavaḍḍhanī {vaddhanī (pī0)}.
[22] paññāsahito naro idha, api dukkhe sukhāni vindati..
[21] ``yo ca dhammavibhaṅgaññū {yo dhammañca vibhāgaññū (pī0)}, kāluṭṭhāyī matandito.
[22] anuṭṭhahati kālena, kammaphalaṃ tassa ijjhati {kammaphalaṃ tassijjhati, phalaṃ tassa samijjhati (ka0)}..
[27] tāni ^a^T1.0534^ea^ tvaṃ tāta sevassu, mā akammāya randhayi.
[22] idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi..
[22] idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi..
[22] idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi..
[22] idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi..
[21] ``dhammaṃ cara mahārāja, samaṇa {samaṇe (syā0 ka0)} brāhmaṇesu ca...pe0.....
[22] idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi..
[21] ``dhammaṃ ^a^T1.0535^ea^ cara mahārāja, dhammo ciṇṇo sukhāvaho {dhammo suciṇṇo sukhamāvahati (ka0)}.
[22] idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi..
[21] ``dhammaṃ cara mahārāja, saindā {indo (pī0), sindā (ka0)} devā sabrahmakā.
[22] suciṇṇena divaṃ pattā, mā dhammaṃ rāja pāmado {pamādo (pī0 ka0)}..
[22] sappaññasevī kalyāṇī, samattaṃ sāma {sāmaṃ (ka0)} taṃ vidū''ti..
[22] rathesabhā tiṭṭhatha ke nu tumhe, kathaṃ vo jānanti manussaloke''..
[21] ``ahamaṭṭhako bhīmaratho panāyaṃ, kāliṅgarājā pana uggatoyaṃ {uggato ayaṃ (pī0), uggatāyaṃ (ka0)}.
[22] susaññatānaṃ isīnaṃ {susaññatānisinaṃ (pī0)} dassanāya, idhāgatā pucchitāyemha pañhe''..
[22] pucchāmi taṃ yakkha mahānubhāva, kathaṃ taṃ jānanti manussaloke''..
[21] ``yamāhu devesu sujampatīti, maghavāti ^a^T1.0536^ea^ taṃ āhu manussaloke.
[22] sa devarājā idamajja patto, susaññatānaṃ isīnaṃ dassanāya''..
[21] ``dūre sutā no isayo samāgatā, mahiddhikā iddhiguṇūpapannā.
[22] vandāmi te ayire pasannacitto, ye jīvalokettha manussaseṭṭhā''..
[21] gandho isīnaṃ ciradikkhitānaṃ {dakkhitānaṃ (syā0 pī0)}, kāyā cuto gacchati mālutena.
[22] ito paṭikkamma sahassanetta, gandho isīnaṃ asuci devarāja''..
[21] ``gandho isīnaṃ ciradikkhitānaṃ, kāyā cuto gacchatu mālutena.
[27] vicitrapupphaṃ surabhiṃva mālaṃ, gandhañca etaṃ pāṭikaṅkhāma bhante.
[21] ``purindado bhūtapatī yasassī, devānamindo sakko {idaṃ padaṃ natthi (sī0 syā0 pī0 potthakesu)} maghavā sujampati.
[22] sa devarājā asuragaṇappamaddano, okāsamākaṅkhati pañha pucchituṃ..
[21] ``ko ^a^T1.0537^ea^ nevimesaṃ idha paṇḍitānaṃ, pañhe puṭṭho nipuṇe byākarissati.
[22] tiṇṇañca raññaṃ manujādhipānaṃ, devānamindassa ca vāsavassa''..
[21] ``ayaṃ ^a^M2.0007^ea^ isi {isī (sī0 pī0)} sarabhaṅgo tapassī {yasassī (sī0)}, yato jāto virato methunasmā.
[22] āceraputto {ācariyaputto (pī0 ka0)} suvinītarūpo, so nesaṃ pañhāni viyākarissati''..
[21] ``koṇḍañña pañhāni viyākarohi, yācanti taṃ isayo sādhurūpā.
[22] koṇḍañña eso manujesu dhammo, yaṃ vuddha {vaddha (pī0), buddha (ka0)} māgacchati esa bhāro''..
[21] ``katāvakāsā ^a^V2.0006^ea^ pucchantu bhonto, yaṃ kiñci pañhaṃ manasābhipatthitaṃ.
[22] ahañhi taṃ taṃ vo viyākarissaṃ, ñatvā sayaṃ lokamimaṃ parañca''..
[21] ``kiṃ sū vadhitvā na kadāci socati, kissappahānaṃ isayo vaṇṇayanti.
[22] kassīdha ^a^T1.0538^ea^ vuttaṃ pharusaṃ khametha, akkhāhi me koṇḍañña etamatthaṃ''..
[21] ``kodhaṃ vadhitvā na kadāci socati, makkhappahānaṃ isayo vaṇṇayanti.
[22] sabbesaṃ vuttaṃ pharusaṃ khametha, etaṃ khantiṃ uttamamāhu santo''..
[21] ``sakkā ubhinnaṃ {hi dvinnaṃ (pī0)} vacanaṃ titikkhituṃ, sadisassa vā seṭṭhatarassa {seṭṭhanarassa (pī0)} vāpi.
[22] kathaṃ nu hīnassa vaco khametha, akkhāhi me koṇḍañña etamatthaṃ''..
[21] ``bhayā ^a^M2.0008^ea^ hi seṭṭhassa vaco khametha, sārambhahetū pana sādisassa.
[22] yo cīdha hīnassa vaco khametha, etaṃ khantiṃ uttamamāhu santo''..
[21] ``kathaṃ vijaññā catupattharūpaṃ {catumaṭṭharūpaṃ (syā0 pī0)}, seṭṭhaṃ sarikkhaṃ athavāpi hīnaṃ.
[22] virūparūpena caranti santo, tasmā hi sabbesaṃ vaco khametha''..
[21] ``na hetamatthaṃ mahatīpi senā, sarājikā yujjhamānā labhetha.
[22] yaṃ ^a^T1.0539^ea^ khantimā sappuriso labhetha, khantī balassūpasamanti verā''..
[21] ``subhāsitaṃ te anumodiyāna, aññaṃ taṃ pucchāmi tadiṅgha brūhi.
[27] yathā ahuṃ {ahū (sī0 syā0 pī0)} daṇḍakī nāḷikero {nāḷikīro (sī0 syā0 pī0)}, athajjuno kalābu cāpi rājā.
[22] tesaṃ gatiṃ brūhi supāpakamminaṃ, katthūpapannā isinaṃ viheṭhakā''..
[21] ``kisañhi {kisaṃpi (pī0)} vacchaṃ avakiriya daṇḍakī, ucchinnamūlo sajano saraṭṭho.
[22] kukkuḷanāme nirayamhi paccati, tassa phuliṅgāni patanti kāye..
[21] ``yo saññate pabbajite aheṭhayi {avañcasi (pī0)}, dhammaṃ bhaṇante samaṇe adūsake.
[22] taṃ nāḷikeraṃ sunakhā parattha, saṅgamma khādanti viphandamānaṃ..
[21] ``athajjuno ^a^M2.0009^ea^ niraye sattisūle, avaṃsiro patito uddhaṃpādo {uddhapādo (syā0), addhapādo (pī0)}.
[22] aṅgīrasaṃ gotamaṃ heṭhayitvā, khantiṃ tapassiṃ cirabrahmacāriṃ..
[21] ``yo ^a^T1.0540^ea^ khaṇḍaso pabbajitaṃ achedayi, khantiṃ vadantaṃ samaṇaṃ adūsakaṃ.
[22] kalābuvīciṃ upapajja paccati, mahāpatāpaṃ {mahābhitāpaṃ (pī0)} kaṭukaṃ bhayānakaṃ..
[21] ``etāni sutvā nirayāni paṇḍito, aññāni pāpiṭṭhatarāni cettha.
[22] dhammaṃ care samaṇabrāhmaṇesu, evaṅkaro saggamupeti ṭhānaṃ''..
[21] ``subhāsitaṃ ^a^V2.0007^ea^ te anumodiyāna, aññaṃ taṃ pucchāmi tadiṅgha brūhi.
[27] kathaṃvidhaṃ sīlavantaṃ vadanti, kathaṃvidhaṃ paññavantaṃ vadanti.
[22] kathaṃvidhaṃ sappurisaṃ vadanti, kathaṃvidhaṃ no siri no jahāti''..
[21] ``kāyena vācāya ca yo'dha {yo ca (pī0)} saññato, manasā ca kiñci na karoti pāpaṃ.
[22] na attahetū alikaṃ bhaṇeti {bhaṇāti (sī0 syā0 pī0)}, tathāvidhaṃ sīlavantaṃ vadanti..
[21] ``gambhīrapañhaṃ manasābhicintayaṃ {manasā vicintayaṃ (sī0)}, nāccāhitaṃ kamma karoti luddaṃ.
[22] kālāgataṃ ^a^T1.0541^ea^ {kālābhataṃ (pī0)} atthapadaṃ na riñcati, tathāvidhaṃ paññavantaṃ vadanti..
[21] ``yo ^a^M2.0010^ea^ ve kataññū katavedi dhīro, kalyāṇamitto daḷhabhatti ca hoti.
[22] dukhitassa sakkacca karoti kiccaṃ, tathāvidhaṃ sappurisaṃ vadanti..
[21] ``etehi sabbehi guṇehupeto, saddho mudū saṃvibhāgī vadaññū.
[22] saṅgāhakaṃ sakhilaṃ saṇhavācaṃ, tathāvidhaṃ no siri no jahāti''..
[21] ``subhāsitaṃ te anumodiyāna, aññaṃ taṃ pucchāmi tadiṅgha brūhi.
[22] sīlaṃ siriñcāpi satañca dhammaṃ, paññañca kaṃ seṭṭhataraṃ vadanti''..
[21] ``paññā hi seṭṭhā kusalā vadanti, nakkhattarājāriva tārakānaṃ.
[22] sīlaṃ sīrī cāpi satañca dhammo {dhammā (pī0)}, anvāyikā paññavato bhavanti''..
[21] ``subhāsitaṃ te anumodiyāna, aññaṃ taṃ pucchāmi tadiṅgha brūhi.
[27] kathaṃkaro ^a^T1.0542^ea^ kintikaro kimācaraṃ, kiṃ sevamāno labhatīdha paññaṃ.
[22] paññāya dānippaṭipaṃ {dāni paṭipadaṃ (sī0 syā0 pī0)} vadehi, kathaṃkaro paññavā hoti macco''..
[21] ``sevetha vuddhe nipuṇe bahussute, uggāhako ca paripucchako siyā.
[22] suṇeyya sakkacca subhāsitāni, evaṃkaro paññavā hoti macco..
[21] ``^a^M2.0011^ea^ paññavā kāmaguṇe avekkhati, aniccato dukkhato rogato ca.
[22] evaṃ vipassī pajahāti chandaṃ, dukkhesu kāmesu mahabbhayesu..
[21] ``sa vītarāgo pavineyya dosaṃ, mettaṃ {metta (syā0 ka0)} cittaṃ bhāvaye {bhāveyya (sī0 syā0 ka0)} appamāṇaṃ.
[22] sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍaṃ, anindito brahmamupeti ṭhānaṃ''..
[21] ``mahatthiyaṃ {mahiddhiyaṃ (sī0 syā0 pī0)} āgamanaṃ ahosi, tavamaṭṭhakā {maṭṭhaka (sī0 syā0 ka0)} bhīmarathassa cāpi.
[22] kāliṅgarājassa ca uggatassa, sabbesa ^a^T1.0543^ea^ vo kāmarāgo pahīno''..
[22] karohi okāsamanuggahāya, yathā gatiṃ te abhisambhavema''..
[21] ``karomi okāsamanuggahāya, tathā hi vo kāmarāgo pahīno.
[22] pharātha kāyaṃ vipulāya pītiyā, yathā gatiṃ me abhisambhavetha''..
[21] ``sabbaṃ ^a^V2.0008^ea^ karissāma tavānusāsaniṃ, yaṃ yaṃ tuvaṃ vakkhasi bhūripañña.
[22] pharāma kāyaṃ vipulāya pītiyā, yathā gatiṃ te abhisambhavema''..
[21] ``katāya {katāyaṃ (sī0 pī0)} vacchassa kisassa pūjā, gacchantu bhonto isayo sādhurūpā.
[22] jhāne ratā hotha sadā samāhitā, esā ratī pabbajitassa seṭṭhā''..
[22] te vedajātā anumodamānā, pakkāmu ^a^T1.0544^ea^ {pakkamu (ka0)} devā devapuraṃ yasassino..
[21] ``gāthā imā atthavatī subyañjanā, subhāsitā isinā paṇḍitena.
[27] yo kocimā aṭṭhikatvā {aṭṭhiṃ katvā (ka0)} suṇeyya, labhetha pubbāpariyaṃ visesaṃ.
[22] laddhāna pubbāpariyaṃ visesaṃ, adassanaṃ maccurājassa gacche''..
[22] pabbato anuruddho ca, kaccāyano ca devalo {devilo (syā0 ka0)}..
[27] nārado udāyī thero {nārado puṇṇo mantānīputto (sī0)}, parisā buddhaparisā.
[21] ``atha bravi brahā indo, vatrabhū jayataṃ pitā.
[22] isippalobhane ^a^T1.0545^ea^ {isipalobhike (sī0 syā0), isiṃ palobhike (pī0)} gaccha, isisiṅgaṃ alambuse..
[21] ``purāyaṃ amhe acceti {nācceti (syā0 ka0)}, vattavā {vatavā (sī0 syā0 pī0)} brahmacariyavā.
[22] nibbānābhirato vuddho {vaddho (pī0), buddho (syā0 ka0)}, tassa maggāni āvara''..
[22] isippalobhane {isipalobhike (sī0 syā0), isiṃ palobhike (pī0)} gaccha, santi aññāpi accharā..
[22] tāsampi hotu pariyāyo, tāpi yantu palobhanā'' {palobhikā (syā0 pī0)}..
[21] ``addhā ^a^V2.0009^ea^ hi saccaṃ bhaṇasi, santi aññāpi accharā.
[22] tādisiyo pavarā ceva, asoke nandane vane..
[21] ``na tā evaṃ pajānanti, pāricariyaṃ pumaṃ gatā.
[22] taveva vaṇṇarūpena, savasamānayissasi'' {vasamānāpayissasi (syā0), vasamānāmayissasi (pī0), taṃ vasamānayissasi (ka0)}..
[22] vibhemi cetaṃ āsāduṃ, uggatejo hi brāhmaṇo..
[22] missā missitu {missetu (sī0 syā0 pī0)} micchantī, isisiṅgaṃ alambusā..
[21] ``vilaggā {vilākā (sī0 syā0 pī0)} mudukā suddhā, pādā te suppatiṭṭhitā.
[22] gamanā kāmanīyā {kamanā kamanīyā (sī0 pī0)} te, harantiyeva me mano..
[22] vimaṭṭhā tuyhaṃ sussoṇī, akkhassa phalakaṃ yathā..
[22] payodharā apatitā {appatītā (sī0 syā0 pī0)}, aḍḍhalābusamā thanā..
[22] āyatā ^a^T1.0547^ea^ ca visālā ca, nettā tava sudassanā..
[21] ``na te samasamaṃ passe, asmiṃ pathavi {puthuvi (pī0)} maṇḍale.
[22] ko vā tvaṃ kassa vā putto, kathaṃ jānemu taṃ mayaṃ''..
[22] ehi taṃ upagūhissaṃ {upaguyhissaṃ (syā0)}, ratīnaṃ kusalo bhava''..
[22] cavitamhi {cavi tamhā (syā0 ka0)} brahmacariyā, yathā taṃ atha tositā..
[21] ``na ^a^V2.0011^ea^ juhe na jape {jappe (ka0)} mante, aggihuttaṃ pahāpitaṃ.
[22] ko nu me pāricariyāya, pubbe cittaṃ palobhayi..
[21] ``araññe me viharato, yo me tejā ha sambhutaṃ {sambhataṃ (pī0)}.
[22] avadhiṃ {avadhī (syā0 pī0 ka0)} cittaṃ cittena, pamādo {pamādā (syā0 pī0)} tvaṃ na bujjhasi''..
[22] iccānusāsi maṃ tāto, yathā maṃ anukampako..
[22] araññe nimmanussamhi, svajja jhāyāmi {svājjajjhāyāmi (sī0 pī0)} ekako..
[22] puna vā tādiso hessaṃ, maraṇaṃ me bhavissati''..
[21] ``tassa ^a^T1.0549^ea^ tejaṃ {tejañca (sī0 pī0)} vīriyañca, dhitiṃ {dhitiñca (pī0)} ñatvā avaṭṭhitaṃ {suvaḍḍhitaṃ (sī0)}.
[21] ``mā me kujjha {kujjhi (pī0)} mahāvīra, mā me kujjha {kujjhi (pī0)} mahāise.
[27] mahā attho mayā ciṇṇo, tidasānaṃ yasassinaṃ.
[22] tayā saṃkampitaṃ āsi, sabbaṃ devapuraṃ tadā''..
[22] tvañca bhadde sukhī hohi, gaccha kaññe yathāsukhaṃ''..
[21] ``tassa pāde gahetvāna, katvā ca naṃ padakkhiṇaṃ.
[22] patīto sumano vitto, devindo adadā varaṃ''..
[22] nisippalobhikā {na isipalobhikā (syā0), na isipalobhiyaṃ (pī0)} gacche, etaṃ sakka varaṃ vare''ti..
[22] kathaṃ nu vittāni pahāya bhoge, pabbaji nikkhamma gharā sapañña'' {sapañño (syā0), sapaññā (pī0)}..
[22] disvāna puññāna mahāvipākaṃ, saddhāyahaṃ pabbajitomhi rāja''..
[21] ``na kāmakāmā na bhayā na dosā, vācaṃ musā pabbajitā bhaṇanti.
[22] akkhāhi me pucchito etamatthaṃ, sutvāna me jāyihitippasādo''..
[21] ``vāṇijja {vaṇijja (pī0)} raṭṭhādhipa gacchamāno, pathe addasāsimhi bhojaputte {milācaputte (sī0 pī0)}.
[22] pavaddhakāyaṃ uragaṃ mahantaṃ, ādāya gacchante pamodamāne''..
[21] ``sohaṃ samāgamma janinda tehi, pahaṭṭhalomo avacamhi bhīto.
[22] kuhiṃ ayaṃ nīyati {niyyati (ka0)} bhīmakāyo, nāgena kiṃ kāhatha bhojaputtā..
[21] ``nāgo ayaṃ nīyati bhojanatthā {bhojanatthaṃ (sī0 syā0 pī0)}, pavaddhakāyo ^a^T1.0551^ea^ urago mahanto.
[22] sāduñca thūlañca muduñca maṃsaṃ, na tvaṃ rasaññāsi videhaputta..
[21] ``ito mayaṃ gantvā sakaṃ niketaṃ {niketanaṃ (pī0)}, ādāya satthāni vikopayitvā.
[22] maṃsāni bhokkhāma {bhakkhāma (syā0)} pamodamānā, mayañhi ve sattavo pannagānaṃ..

[03] ``aṭṭhahi khalu, samma puṇṇamukha, ṭhānehi itthī sāmikaṃ avajānāti. daliddatā, āturatā, jiṇṇatā, surāsoṇḍatā, muddhatā, pamattatā, sabbakiccesu anuvattanatā, sabbadhanānuppadānena ^a^V2.0086^ea^ -- imehi khalu, samma puṇṇamukha, aṭṭhahi ṭhānehi itthī sāmikaṃ avajānāti. bhavati ca panuttarettha vākyaṃ --
[27] pamattaṃ muddhapattañca, sabbakiccesu {rattaṃ kiccesu (sī0 pī0)} hāpanaṃ.

[03] ``navahi khalu, samma puṇṇamukha, ṭhānehi itthī padosamāharati. ārāmagamanasīlā ca hoti, uyyānagamanasīlā ca hoti, nadītitthagamanasīlā ca hoti, ñātikulagamanasīlā ca hoti, parakulagamanasīlā ca hoti, ādāsadussamaṇḍanānuyogamanuyuttasīlā ca hoti, majjapāyinī ca hoti, nillokanasīlā ca hoti, sadvāraṭhāyinī {padvāraṭṭhāyinī (sī0 syā0 pī0)} ca hoti -- imehi khalu, samma puṇṇamukha, navahi ṭhānehi itthī padosamāharatīti. bhavati ca panuttarettha vākyaṃ --
[21] `ārāmasīlā ca {ārāmasīlā (sī0 pī0)} uyyānaṃ, nadī ñāti parakulaṃ.

[03] ``cattālīsāya {cattālīsāyi (pī0 ka0)} khalu, samma puṇṇamukha, ṭhānehi itthī purisaṃ accācarati {accāvadati (sī0 syā0 pī0)}. vijambhati, vinamati, vilasati, vilajjati, nakhena nakhaṃ ghaṭṭeti, pādena pādaṃ akkamati, kaṭṭhena pathaviṃ vilikhati {likhati (sī0 pī0)}, dārakaṃ ullaṅghati ullaṅghāpeti {dārakaṃ ullaṅgheti olaṅgheti (sī0 pī0)}, kīḷati kīḷāpeti, cumbati cumbāpeti, bhuñjati bhuñjāpeti, dadāti, yācati, katamanukaroti, uccaṃ bhāsati, nīcaṃ bhāsati, aviccaṃ bhāsati, viviccaṃ bhāsati, naccena gītena vāditena rodanena {roditena (sī0 pī0)} vilasitena vibhūsitena jagghati, pekkhati, kaṭiṃ cāleti, guyhabhaṇḍakaṃ sañcāleti, ūruṃ vivarati, ūruṃ pidahati, thanaṃ dasseti, kacchaṃ dasseti, nābhiṃ dasseti, akkhiṃ nikhanati, bhamukaṃ ukkhipati, oṭṭhaṃ upalikhati {oṭṭhaṃ palikhati jivhaṃ palikhati (sī0 pī0)}, jivhaṃ nillāleti, dussaṃ muñcati, dussaṃ paṭibandhati, sirasaṃ muñcati, sirasaṃ bandhati -- imehi khalu, samma puṇṇamukha, cattālīsāya ṭhānehi itthī purisaṃ accācarati.

[03] ``pañcavīsāya {pañcavīsāhi (pī0 ka0)} khalu, samma puṇṇamukha, ṭhānehi itthī paduṭṭhā veditabbā bhavati. sāmikassa pavāsaṃ vaṇṇeti, pavuṭṭhaṃ na ^a^T2.0117^ea^ sarati, āgataṃ nābhinandati, avaṇṇaṃ tassa bhaṇati, vaṇṇaṃ ^a^V2.0087^ea^ tassa na bhaṇati, anatthaṃ tassa carati, atthaṃ tassa na carati, akiccaṃ tassa karoti, kiccaṃ tassa na karoti, paridahitvā sayati, parammukhī nipajjati, parivattakajātā kho pana hoti kuṅkumiyajātā, dīghaṃ assasati, dukkhaṃ vedayati, uccārapassāvaṃ abhiṇhaṃ gacchati, vilomamācarati, parapurisasaddaṃ sutvā kaṇṇasotaṃ vivaramodahati {vivarati kamodahati (pī0)}, nihatabhogā kho pana hoti, paṭivissakehi santhavaṃ karoti, nikkhantapādā kho pana hoti, visikhānucārinī aticārinī kho pana hoti, niccaṃ {natthi sī0 syā0 pī0 potthakesu} sāmike agāravā paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappā, abhiṇhaṃ dvāre tiṭṭhati, kacchāni aṅgāni thanāni dasseti, disodisaṃ gantvā pekkhati -- imehi khalu, samma puṇṇamukha, pañcavīsāya {pañcavīsāhi (ka0)} ṭhānehi itthī paduṭṭhā veditabbā bhavati. bhavati ca panuttarettha vākyaṃ --
[21] `pavāsaṃ ^a^M2.0122^ea^ tassa vaṇṇeti, gataṃ tassa na socati {pavāsa'massa vaṇṇeti gatiṃ nānusocati (sī0 pī0)}.
[22] bhattāravaṇṇaṃ na kadāci bhāsati, ete paduṭṭhāya bhavanti lakkhaṇā..
[21] `anatthaṃ tassa carati asaññatā, atthañca hāpeti akiccakārinī.
[22] paridahitvā ^a^T2.0118^ea^ sayati parammukhī, ete paduṭṭhāya bhavanti lakkhaṇā..
[21] `parivattajātā ca {parāvattakajātā ca (sī0)} bhavati kuṅkumī, dīghañca assasati dukkhavedinī.
[22] uccārapassāvamabhiṇhaṃ gacchati, ete paduṭṭhāya bhavanti lakkhaṇā..
[22] nihatabhogā ca karoti santhavaṃ, ete paduṭṭhāya bhavanti lakkhaṇā..
[21] `kicchena laddhaṃ kasirābhataṃ {kasirenābhataṃ (sī0)} dhanaṃ, vittaṃ vināseti dukkhena sambhataṃ.
[22] paṭivissakehi ca karoti santhavaṃ, ete paduṭṭhāya bhavanti lakkhaṇā..
[21] `nikkhantapādā visikhānucārinī, niccañca sāmimhi {niccaṃ sasāmimhi (pī0 ka0)} paduṭṭhamānasā.
[22] aticārinī hoti apetagāravā {tatheva'gāravā (sī0 pī0)}, ete paduṭṭhāya bhavanti lakkhaṇā..
[21] `abhikkhaṇaṃ ^a^M2.0123^ea^ tiṭṭhati dvāramūle, thanāni kacchāni ca dassayantī.
[22] disodisaṃ ^a^T2.0119^ea^ pekkhati bhantacittā, ete paduṭṭhāya bhavanti lakkhaṇā..
[21] `sace labhetha khaṇaṃ vā raho vā, nivātakaṃ vāpi labhetha tādisaṃ.
[22] sabbāva itthī kayiruṃ nu {kareyyu no (sī0), kareyyuṃ no (pī0)} pāpaṃ, aññaṃ alattha {aladdhā (syā0 pī0 ka0)} pīṭhasappināpi saddhiṃ..
[22] sabbattha nāpītikarāpi {sabba'ttanā'pītikārāpi (sī0 syā0)} ce siyā {siyuṃ (syā0)}, na vissase titthasamā hi nāriyo''ti..
[21] `yaṃ ve {yañca (syā0 ka0)} disvā kaṇḍarīkinnarānaṃ {kinnarakinnarīnaṃ (syā0), kinnarīkinnarānaṃ (ka0)}, sabbitthiyo na ramanti agāre.
[22] taṃ tādisaṃ maccaṃ cajitvā bhariyā, aññaṃ disvā purisaṃ pīṭhasappiṃ..
[21] `bakassa ca bāvarikassa {pāvārikassa (sī0), bāvariyassa (syā0)} rañño, accantakāmānugatassa bhariyā.
[22] avācarī {accācari (syā0), anācari (ka0)} paṭṭhavasānugassa {baddhavasānugassa (sī0 syā0), pattavasānugatassa (ka0)}, kaṃ vāpi itthī nāticare tadaññaṃ..
[22] avācarī paṭṭhavasānugassa, taṃ vāpi sā nājjhagā kāmakāminī..
[21] `na tā pajānanti kataṃ na kiccaṃ, na mātaraṃ pitaraṃ bhātaraṃ vā.
[22] anariyā samatikkantadhammā, sasseva cittassa vasaṃ vajanti..
[21] `cirānuvuṭṭhampi {cirānuvutthampi (sī0 pī0)} piyaṃ manāpaṃ, anukampakaṃ pāṇasamampi bhattuṃ {santaṃ (sī0 syā0 pī0)}.
[22] āvāsu kiccesu ca naṃ jahanti, tasmāhamitthīnaṃ na vissasāmi..
[21] `thīnañhi cittaṃ yathā vānarassa, kannappakannaṃ yathā rukkhachāyā.
[22] calācalaṃ hadayamitthiyānaṃ, cakkassa nemi viya parivattati..
[21] `yadā tā passanti samekkhamānā, ādeyyarūpaṃ purisassa vittaṃ.
[22] saṇhāhi ^a^T2.0121^ea^ vācāhi nayanti menaṃ, kambojakā jalajeneva assaṃ..
[21] `yadā na passanti samekkhamānā, ādeyyarūpaṃ purisassa vittaṃ.
[22] samantato naṃ parivajjayanti, tiṇṇo nadīpāragatova kullaṃ..
[22] sevanti hetā piyamappiyañca, nāvā yathā orakūlaṃ {orakulaṃ (sī0) evamuparipi} parañca..
[21] `na tā ekassa na dvinnaṃ, āpaṇova pasārito.
[22] yo tā mayhanti maññeyya, vātaṃ jālena bādhaye {bandhaye (syā0 ka0)}..
[21] `yathā nadī ca pantho ca, pānāgāraṃ sabhā papā.
[22] evaṃ lokitthiyo nāma, velā tāsaṃ na vijjati {kesuci potthakesu imissā gāthāya pubbaddhāparaddhaṃ vipariyāyena dissati}..
[21] `ghatāsanaṃ kuñjaraṃ kaṇhasappaṃ, muddhābhisittaṃ pamadā ca sabbā.
[22] ete naro {etena so (pī0)} niccayato {niccayatto (sī0 pī0)} bhajetha, tesaṃ have dubbidu sabbabhāvo {saccabhāvo (syā0)}..
[21] `naccantavaṇṇā ^a^T2.0122^ea^ ^a^V2.0089^ea^ na bahūnaṃ kantā, na dakkhiṇā pamadā sevitabbā.
[22] na parassa bhariyā na dhanassa hetu, etitthiyo pañca na sevitabbā'''..
[03] atha khalu, bho, ānando gijjharājā kuṇālassa sakuṇassa ādimajjhakathāpariyosānaṃ {ādimajjhagāthāpariyosānaṃ (syā0 ka0)} viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imā gāthāyo abhāsi --
[21] ``puṇṇampi cemaṃ pathaviṃ dhanena, dajjitthiyā puriso sammatāya.
[22] laddhā khaṇaṃ atimaññeyya tampi, tāsaṃ vasaṃ asatīnaṃ na gacche..
[22] āvāsu kiccesu ca naṃ jahanti, tasmāhamitthīnaṃ {tasmā hi itthīnaṃ (sī0 pī0)} na vissasāmi..
[21] ``na vissase icchati manti poso, na vissase rodati me sakāse.
[22] sevanti hetā piyamappiyañca, nāvā yathā orakūlaṃ parañca..
[22] na vissase rājānaṃ sakhā {rājā sakhā (sī0 pī0)} mamanti, na vissase itthi dasanna mātaraṃ..
[22] accantapemānugatassa bhariyā, na vissase titthasamā hi nāriyo..
[21] ``haneyyuṃ chindeyyuṃ chedāpeyyumpi {haneyyu chindeyyuṃpi chadayeyyuṃ (sī0 pī0), haneyyuṃpi chindeyyuṃpi chedāpeyyuṃpi (syā0)}, kaṇṭhepi {kaṇṭhampi (sī0 syā0)} chetvā rudhiraṃ piveyyuṃ.
[22] mā dīnakāmāsu asaññatāsu, bhāvaṃ kare gaṅgatitthūpamāsu..
[21] ``musā tāsaṃ yathā saccaṃ, saccaṃ tāsaṃ yathā musā.
[21] ``coriyo kathinā {kaṭhinā (sī0 syā0 pī0)} hetā, vāḷā ca lapasakkharā.
[22] na tā kiñci na jānanti, yaṃ manussesu vañcanaṃ..
[21] ``asā ^a^M2.0127^ea^ lokitthiyo nāma, velā tāsaṃ na vijjati.
[22] sārattā ca pagabbhā ca, sikhī sabbaghaso yathā..
[22] sevanti hetā piyamappiyañca, nāvā yathā orakūlaṃ parañca..
[22] anugacchanti {gacchanti (pī0)} anupatanti, dhanahetu hi nāriyo''ti {dhanahetu ca nāriyo (syā0), dhanahetu nāriyo (pī0)}..
[03] atha khalu, bho, nārado devabrāhmaṇo ānandassa gijjharājassa ādimajjhakathāpariyosānaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imā gāthāyo abhāsi --
[21] ``cattārome na pūrenti, te me suṇātha bhāsato.
[22] samuddo brāhmaṇo rājā, itthī cāpi dijampati..
[22] tā samuddaṃ na pūrenti, ūnattā hi na pūrati..
[22] bhiyyopi sutamiccheyya, ūnattā hi na pūrati..
[22] pāraṃ ^a^T2.0125^ea^ samuddaṃ pattheti, ūnattā hi na pūrati..
[22] kareyya navame chandaṃ, ūnattā hi na pūrati..
[22] sabbitthiyo kaṇṭakānaṃva sākhā, sabbitthiyo dhanahetu vajanti..
[21] ``vātañca jālena naro parāmase, osiñcaye {osañciyā (sī0 pī0)} sāgaramekapāṇinā.
[22] sakena hatthena kareyya ghosaṃ {sakena kālena haneyya ghosanaṃ (pī0)}, yo sabbabhāvaṃ pamadāsu osaje..
[21] ``yaṃ ^a^V2.0091^ea^ etā {yañcetā (syā0)} upasevanti, chandasā vā dhanena vā.
[03] atha ^a^T2.0126^ea^ khalu, bho, kuṇālo sakuṇo nāradassa devabrāhmaṇassa ādimajjhakathāpariyosānaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imā gāthāyo abhāsi --
[22] uggatejamuragampi āside, eko ekāya pamadāya nālape {eko ekapamadaṃ hi nālape (pī0) eko ekapamādāya nālape (?)}..
[21] ``natthi ^a^M2.0129^ea^ tāsaṃ vinayo na saṃvaro, majjamaṃsaniratā {majjamaṃsābhiratā (ka0)} asaññatā.
[22] tā gilanti purisassa pābhataṃ, sāgareva makaraṃ timiṅgalo {timiṅgilo (sī0 pī0)}..
[21] ``yaṃ naraṃ upalapenti {uparamanti (sī0 pī0), palāpenti (ka0)} nāriyo, chandasā va ^a^T2.0127^ea^ ratiyā dhanena vā.
[22] jātavedasadisampi tādisaṃ, rāgadosavadhiyo {rāgadosavatiyo (sī0 pī0)} dahanti naṃ..
[21] ``aḍḍhaṃ ñatvā purisaṃ mahaddhanaṃ, osaranti sadhanā sahattanā.
[22] uhasanti {ūhasanti (sī0 pī0), ohasanti (syā0)} pahasanti nāriyo, sambarova {saṃvarova (syā0 pī0 ka0)} satamāyakovidā..
[22] rakkhitā aticaranti sāmikaṃ, dānavaṃva hadayantarassitā {hadayantanissitā (ka0), hadayantaranissitā (syā0)}..
[21] ``tejavāpi ^a^M2.0130^ea^ hi naro vicakkhaṇo, sakkato bahujanassa pūjito.
[22] nārinaṃ vasagato na bhāsati, rāhunā upahatova candimā..
[21] ``yaṃ kareyya kupito diso disaṃ, duṭṭhacitto ^a^T2.0128^ea^ vasamāgataṃ ariṃ {ari (sī0 pī0)}.
[22] tena bhiyyo byasanaṃ nigacchati, nārinaṃ vasagato apekkhavā..
[22] hīnamevupagatā hi nāriyo, tā ramanti kuṇapeva makkhikā..
[21] ``tā kulesu visikhantaresu vā, rājadhāninigamesu vā puna {vā pana (syā0)}.
[21] ``so idha garahito parattha ca, dummatī upahato {upagato (sī0 pī0)} sakammunā.
[22] nāsayanti pamadā pamādinaṃ, duggatiñca paṭipādayanti naṃ..
[22] soṇṇabyamhanilayā {suvaṇṇabyamhanilayā (syā0 ka0), sovaṇṇabyamhanilayā (pī0)} ca accharā, ye caranti pamadāhanatthikā..
[21] ``kāmadhātusamatikkamā gati, rūpadhātuyā bhāvo {rūpadhātuyā bhavo (sī0), rūpadhātusambhavo (syā0)} na dullabho.
[22] nibbutehi sucihī na dullabhaṃ, ye caranti pamadāhanatthikā''ti..
[21] ``kasmā tuvaṃ rasaka edisāni, karosi kammāni sudāruṇāni.
[22] hanāsi itthī purise ca mūḷho, maṃsassa hetu adu {ādu (sī0 syā0)} dhanassa kāraṇā''..
[21] ``naṃ ^a^M2.0132^ea^ attahetū na dhanassa kāraṇā, na puttadārassa sahāyañātinaṃ.
[22] bhattā ca me bhagavā bhūmipālo, so khādati maṃsaṃ bhadantedisaṃ''..
[21] ``sace tuvaṃ bhatturatthe payutto, karosi kammāni sudāruṇāni.
[22] pātova antepuraṃ pāpuṇitvā, lapeyyāsi me rājino sammukhe taṃ''..
[21] ``tathā karissāmi ahaṃ bhadante, yathā tuvaṃ {yameva tvaṃ (sī0)} bhāsasi kāḷahatthi.
[22] pātova antepuraṃ pāpuṇitvā, vakkhāmi ^a^T2.0131^ea^ te rājino sammukhe taṃ''..
[21] tato ^a^V2.0093^ea^ ratyā vivasāne {vivasane (sī0 syā0 pī0)}, sūriyuggamanaṃ pati.
[22] upasaṅkamma {upasaṅkamitvā (sī0 syā0 pī0)} rājānaṃ, idaṃ vacanamabravi..
[21] ``evaṃ pamatto rasagārave ratto {rato (sī0 syā0 pī0)}, bālo yadī āyati nāvabujjhati.
[22] vidhamma putte caji {cajitvā (ka0)} ñātake ca, parivattiya attānaññeva {attānameva (sī0 pī0)} khādati..
[21] ``idaṃ ^a^M2.0133^ea^ te sutvāna vigetu {vihetu (sī0 pī0)} chando, mā bhakkhayī {mā bhakkhasī (sī0 pī0)} rāja manussamaṃsaṃ.
[22] mā tvaṃ imaṃ kevalaṃ vārijova, dvipadādhipa {dipadādipa (sī0 pī0) evamuparipi} suññamakāsi raṭṭhaṃ''..
[21] ``sujāto nāma nāmena, oraso tassa atrajo {tassa orasa atrajo (sī0), tassa atraja oraso (pī0)}.

[21] ``rasānaṃ aññataraṃ etaṃ, kasmā {yasmā (sī0 pī0)} maṃ tvaṃ nivāraye.

[21] ``tiṭṭhāhīti mayā vutto, so tvaṃ gacchasi pammukho {pāmukho (ka0)}.
